document_data.caption: A map showing Brass Street in northeast Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Brass Street
document_data.ends: The wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Brass Street''' was a small road located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Brass Street was located in the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]] in the northeast section of the city near the [[Dragon Gate]]. The road ran parallel with the nearby [[Street of Dragons]] one block to the east. It originated along [[Fortress Street]] and passed south for {{SI|300|ft|long=yes}} before terminating at the wall that separated the [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]] from the rest of Zhentil Keep.
document_data.Notable Locations: A [[Zhentilar]] barracks and armory were located on Brass Street.
